prompt.content: Using VF Corporations (NYSE: VFC)'s 10-K from 2025, calculate the return on equity (ROE) for FY 2025 if average shareholders equity grows at the same rate as the Productivity Growth Rate (Labor Productivity) as of 2024-12-31, assuming all other relevant inputs remain at their current level. Round your answer to 2 decimal points. Show your full solution; include formulas, calculations, intermediate steps, and assumptions.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"ROE = Net income / Average stockholders’ equity","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Assume net income held at its FY2025 level from VF Corporation's FY2025 10‑K","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Assume FY2025 average stockholders’ equity is projected by growing FY2024 average equity at the Labor Productivity growth rate as of 2024-12-31"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Amounts are stated in U.S. dollars and presented in thousands"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2025 net income (loss) = $(189,716) thousand (negative $189.716 million) from Consolidated Statements of Operations for year ended March 29, 2025"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total stockholders’ equity at FY2023 year‑end (March 2023) = $2,910,713 thousand"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total stockholders’ equity at FY2024 year‑end (March 2024) = $1,658,365 thousand"},{"criteria":"FY2024 average stockholders’ equity = (2,910,713k + 1,658,365k) / 2 = 2,284,539k","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Labor Productivity growth rate used = 2.0% (Nonfarm business labor productivity change Q4 2023 to Q4 2024; BLS release March 6, 2025)"},{"criteria":"Projected average equity FY2025 = 2,284,539k × 1.02 = 2,330,229.78k","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Computed FY2025 ROE = (−189,716k) / (2,330,229.78k) = −0.081415","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Final answer: −8.14% (rounded to two decimals)","operator":"correctness"}]
